page.title: 17Housing in Royston
page.content: There is a variety of houses in the area. People have lived in Royston for hundreds of years and a few houses in the town are very old.There are victorian houses to the north of the town some are detached villas,others semi_detached or terraced.These were built without garages, because the victorians didn't have cars.On Queens Road there were some almshouses which are now houses for old people. The new estates have a mixture of all types of housing. Most have a garage and a garden.Some residents think the houses are too close togeth- er, but most think there is enough space.There are flats for elderly people and a new home for old people has just been built.Although there are areas of grass on the new estates a lot of children play in the streets.
